attributes.action: Demand a General Election(Vote of No Confidence)
attributes.additional_details: Total negligence in protecting British Citizens on a rally from genocide, whether it be EDF or any other. Millions of our workers being undercut for jobs by an open door on EU migrants being exploited.Many have to give a large amount of our minimum wage back in rent to their employers.A practice of forcing benefit claimants to work voluntary to provide nothing but free temporary labour for companies. Please vote to remove this, (In my opinion! for legal reasons, disgraceful and indeed traiterous government)Fellow British Lions please, please rediscover your roar & make a stand for the future of your own communities & our country.
